SlackAgent.name: slack_list_channels
SlackAgent.description: List all Slack channels the bot is a member of, including channel ID, name, and topic.

limit.description: Maximum number of channels to return.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for next page of results.

SlackAgent.name: slack_post_message
SlackAgent.description: Post a message to a Slack channel.

channel.description: The channel ID or name to post to.

SlackAgent.name: slack_search_messages
SlackAgent.description: Search for messages in Slack matching a query string.

SlackAgent.name: slack_get_channel_history
SlackAgent.description: Retrieve recent messages (conversation history) from a Slack channel.

channel.description: The channel ID to fetch history for.

limit.description: Maximum number of messages to return.

SlackAgent.name: slack_get_thread
SlackAgent.description: Retrieve replies in a Slack message thread.

channel.description: The channel ID containing the thread.

thread_ts.description: The timestamp of the parent message.

JiraAgent.name: jira_search_issues
JiraAgent.description: Search for Jira issues using JQL (Jira Query Language). Use this for any issue lookup including getting issue details by key.

jql.description: The JQL query string to search for issues.

maxResults.description: Maximum number of results to return.

fields.description: List of fields to include in results.

JiraAgent.name: jira_list_projects
JiraAgent.description: List all Jira projects visible to the current user.

JiraAgent.name: jira_list_statuses
JiraAgent.description: List all issue statuses available in the Jira instance.

JiraAgent.name: jira_list_priorities
JiraAgent.description: List all priority levels available in the Jira instance.

JiraAgent.name: jira_get_transitions
JiraAgent.description: Get available workflow transitions for a specific Jira issue.

JiraAgent.name: jira_get_comments
JiraAgent.description: Get all comments on a specific Jira issue.

JiraAgent.name: jira_get_worklogs
JiraAgent.description: Get work log entries for a specific Jira issue.

JiraAgent.name: jira_get_project
JiraAgent.description: Get detailed information about a specific Jira project.

projectKeyOrId.description: The project key or numeric ID.

JiraAgent.name: jira_list_sprints
JiraAgent.description: List all sprints for a given Jira board.

boardId.description: The board ID to list sprints for.

state.description: Filter by sprint state: active, closed, future.

JiraAgent.name: jira_get_sprint
JiraAgent.description: Get details of a specific sprint by ID.

JiraAgent.name: jira_get_board
JiraAgent.description: Get details of a specific Jira board.

JiraAgent.name: jira_list_boards
JiraAgent.description: List all boards in the Jira instance.

type.description: Filter by board type: scrum, kanban.

JiraAgent.name: jira_get_issue_link_types
JiraAgent.description: List available issue link types (e.g., blocks, duplicates).

JiraAgent.name: jira_link_issues
JiraAgent.description: Create a link between two Jira issues.

linkType.description: The type of link (e.g., Blocks, Duplicates).

JiraAgent.name: jira_list_fields
JiraAgent.description: List all fields available in the Jira instance.

JiraAgent.name: jira_get_field
JiraAgent.description: Get details of a specific Jira field.

GitHubAgent.name: get_file_contents
GitHubAgent.description: Get the contents of a file or directory from a GitHub repository.

GitHubAgent.name: search_repositories
GitHubAgent.description: Search for GitHub repositories matching a query.

GitHubAgent.name: create_issue
GitHubAgent.description: Create a new issue in a GitHub repository.

GitHubAgent.name: list_issues
GitHubAgent.description: List issues in a GitHub repository.

GitHubAgent.name: list_pull_requests
GitHubAgent.description: List pull requests in a GitHub repository.

GitHubAgent.name: create_pull_request
GitHubAgent.description: Create a new pull request in a GitHub repository.

GitHubAgent.name: search_code
GitHubAgent.description: Search for code across GitHub repositories.

GitHubAgent.name: search_issues
GitHubAgent.description: Search for issues and pull requests across GitHub repositories.

GitHubAgent.name: search_users
GitHubAgent.description: Search for GitHub users matching a query.

GitHubAgent.name: list_commits
GitHubAgent.description: List commits on a branch or path in a GitHub repository.

GitHubAgent.name: get_pull_request
GitHubAgent.description: Get details of a specific pull request.

GitHubAgent.name: get_pull_request_files
GitHubAgent.description: List files changed in a pull request.

GitHubAgent.name: create_branch
GitHubAgent.description: Create a new branch in a GitHub repository.

GitHubAgent.name: fork_repository
GitHubAgent.description: Fork a GitHub repository to your account.
